MOSDAC provides satellite-based meteorological and oceanographic products including:
- Daily Rainfall Estimates (DRE)
- Outgoing Longwave Radiation (OLR)
- Cloud Motion Vectors (CMVs)
- Sea Surface Temperature (SST)
- Snow Cover Area (SCA)
- Atmospheric Motion Vectors (AMVs)
These products are derived from INSAT, SCATSAT-1, and Megha-Tropiques satellites.
